nodes.text: A class of freighter was widely used in the centuries leading up to the Jedi Civil War that featured three engines, an elongated body, and a brownish hull. It was not uncommon during the time of the Cold War, and later the Galactic War, to see this class of freighter used in combat by third-parties around the galaxy. The Mantellian Separatist Movement was able to deploy at least two freighter against the Republic Navy.
Czerka Corporation's mobile research laboratory Theoretika was of this class.
This class of freighter was created for the BioWare video game Star Wars: The Old Republic released in 2011, but was never identified by a class-name in-game.
